participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Sociable and adventurous, Alex enjoys meeting new people and exploring new experiences. She has a positive outlook on life and loves to share her interests with others.
participant_1.background: Everyday after work I buy my dog a dog biscuit. I currently work at Target. I live in a house in California. I try to take a break and see a movie in theaters every other month.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Curious and imaginative, Jordan has a unique perspective on life and enjoys sharing his quirky experiences. He values creativity and enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_2.background: I once saw the easter bunny hiding behind my closet door. My mom is a checker at the local grocery store. I love watching Game of Thrones. I do not like the song Sweet Home Alabama. I grew up in Alabama.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
What do you do for a living?
I work as a checker at the local grocery store.
Oh, cool! I used to work as a cashier at a grocery store when I was in college.
What was that like?
It was fun! I got to meet a lot of interesting people.
Me too! I love meeting new people.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love watching Game of Thrones!
Oh, me too! I'm so excited for the new season to come out.
Me too! I can't wait to see what happens next.
What's your favorite character?
I love Tyrion Lannister. He's so funny and witty.
Me too! He's one of my favorites too.
What other TV shows do you like to watch?
I like a lot of different shows, but my favorites are probably Game of Thrones, Westworld, and The Walking Dead.
I've heard good things about Westworld. I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
I will!
What do you like to do for fun in your free time?
I like to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I also like to play video games.
Me too! I love hiking and biking. I don't really play video games, but I like to watch people play them.
That's cool! I play video games with my friends all the time.
That sounds fun!
It is
